properties.areaDesc: Dunkirk to Buffalo NY; Ripley to Dunkirk NY
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:45AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds to 40 knots and waves
10 to 13 feet expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, south
winds to 30 knots and waves 3 to 5 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Erie from Ripley to
Buffalo.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 1 PM EST Sunday. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
